books.title: Deep Work
books.author: Cal Newport
books.summary: Deep Work: Rules for Focused Success in a Distracted World” by Cal Newport (Book Summary) Deep Work by Cal Newport is a book about the science of productivity. Cal argues the best way to get more meaningful work done is by working deeply – working in a state of high concentration without distractions on a single task

books.author: George Orwell
books.summary: Nineteen Eighty-Four is a dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale written by English writer George Orwell. It was published on 8 June 1949 by Secker & Warburg as Orwell's ninth and final book completed in his lifetime.
